# Chatters - Real-Time Customer Feedback for Hospitality

> Chatters is a customer feedback platform designed specifically for hospitality venues including restaurants, hotels, pubs, and bars.

## What is Chatters?

Chatters helps hospitality businesses collect, analyze, and act on customer feedback in real-time. Instead of waiting for negative reviews on Google or TripAdvisor, venues can identify and resolve issues while customers are still on-site.

## Key Features

### Real-Time Feedback Collection
- QR code-based feedback forms customers scan at their table
- Instant notifications when feedback is submitted
- Custom questions tailored to your venue

### Kiosk Mode / Staff View
- Live floor plan showing table status
- Priority queue for urgent issues
- One-click issue resolution tracking
- Assistance request handling

### NPS (Net Promoter Score)
- Automated NPS surveys
- Track customer loyalty over time
- Identify promoters and detractors

### Staff Recognition
- Link feedback to specific staff members
- Leaderboards and performance tracking
- Recognition emails for positive mentions

### Analytics & Reporting
- Satisfaction trends over time
- Response time analytics
- Multi-venue comparison (for chains/groups)
- Google and TripAdvisor rating tracking

### Review Boosting
- Redirect happy customers to leave public reviews
- Capture unhappy feedback privately before it goes public

## Who is Chatters for?

- Restaurants and cafes
- Hotels and accommodation
- Pubs and bars
- Any hospitality venue wanting to improve customer experience

## How it Works

1. Venue sets up custom feedback questions
2. QR codes are placed on tables
3. Customers scan and provide feedback
4. Staff receive instant alerts for issues
5. Problems are resolved before customers leave
6. Happy customers are encouraged to leave public reviews

## Benefits

- Catch problems before they become bad reviews
- Improve staff accountability
- Data-driven service improvements
- Higher Google and TripAdvisor ratings
- Better customer retention
